name: Chat's Pet Slime
description:
Ever wanted a pet for your streams? Now you can have your own Slime on Twitch!

Chat's Pet Slime is a Virtual Pet for Twitch. Viewers are able to use channel points to interact with the Slime.

They can do things such as:

  • Pet the Slime
  • Feed the Slime
  • Punch the Slime
  • Change Slime's Color

For Setup Instructions, unzip files and open README.txt.

Big thanks to:

  • LazerSpammer and TheKellerBee for playtesting
  • TwitchLib - For the code to connect to Twitch
  • Auth Code - For the authorization example to connect to Twitch
